attributes.action: Cut the grass on Victoria Park football pitch in Plymouth
attributes.additional_details: I was out taking my dog for a walk and I nearly broke my ankle in a ditch because the grass was so long I couldn't see where I was going please cut the grass ASAP just incase it happens to a child or something its easly done
attributes.background: The grass is aboit 4ft High and it needs attention its a shame that its grown that much because its a lovely area

rejection.details:
This is a matter for Plymouth City Council, not the UK Government or Parliament. You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
